amendment.description: To clarify the definition of the term "smart manufacturing".

vote.text: Amendment SA 2968 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2968 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S245-247; text: CR S245) To clarify the definition of the term "smart manufacturing".
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2968 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2968 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 2953.
